issue.title: [Docs] UDF Documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15638](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15638). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Document the usage of UDFs and important facts about the limitations and provide warnings to the user. 

For example:

System calls to fork, modify system attributes or runtime information and states can be harmful when executed via a UDF.

comments.body:

For the documentation task, the usage of UDF must be clearly stated and the limitations. This must address what is discussed in this thread in Scalar UDF PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12590#issuecomment-1089426784
